name: oak
description: A very opinionated kiosk framework based on Electron

scripts.coverage: node node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/tape test/*.js || true
scripts.coveralls: npm run-script coverage && node node_modules/.bin/coveralls < coverage/lcov.info && rm -rf coverage/ || true
scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/standard && find test/*.js | xargs -n 1 node | node_modules/.bin/tap-difflet

author: Flynn Joffray <nucleardreamer@gmail.com>
